INLINE.VALUE: select i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'fast_start_mttr_target' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = '_fast_start_instance_recovery_target' order by i.inst_id
select name,value,sid,isspecified from gv$spparameter where name like 'memory_target' and isspecified not like 'false' and value not like '0' and sid like '*'
select i.instance_name,p.value as pre_page_sga from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'pre_page_sga' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as parallel_execution_messagesize from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'parallel_execution_message_size' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as optimizer_dynamic_sampling from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'optimizer_dynamic_sampling' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as disk_asynch_io from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'disk_asynch_io' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as disk_asynch_io from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'db_writer_processes' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as disk_asynch_io from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'dbwr_io_slaves' order by i.inst_id

select i.instance_name, decode(p.value, NULL,0, p.value) max_commit_propagation_delay from gv$instance i left outer join (select p.inst_id, p.value from gv$parameter p where p.name = 'max_commit_propagation_delay') p using(inst_id)
SELECT count(*) as invalid_java_obj FROM dba_objects WHERE object_type LIKE '%JAVA%' AND status='INVALID' AND owner='SYS'
select count(*) as SYSAUX_TS from v$tablespace where name = 'SYSAUX'
select dbms_java.longname('true') JVM from dual
SELECT count(*) as java_based_users FROM dba_users WHERE username LIKE '%AURORA%' AND username LIKE '%OSE%'
SELECT count(*) java_role_count FROM dba_roles WHERE role LIKE '%JAVA%'
SELECT substr(version,1,6) FROM SYS.registry$ WHERE cid='JAVAVM' AND status <> 99
SELECT count(*) invalid_obj FROM dba_objects WHERE status != 'VALID' AND owner in ('SYS','SYSTEM') and object_name NOT LIKE 'BIN$%'
SELECT count(1) app_invalid_obj FROM dba_objects WHERE status != 'VALID' AND owner not in ('SYS','SYSTEM') and object_name NOT LIKE 'BIN$%'
select i.instance_name,p.value as spfile from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'spfile' order by i.inst_id
SELECT SUBSTR(metadata,109,4) db_wordsize FROM sys.kopm$

SELECT count(1) DUPE_SYS_SYSTEM_OBJ FROM dba_objects WHERE object_name not in ( 'AQ$_SCHEDULES', 'AQ$_SCHEDULES_PRIMARY', 'DBMS_REPCAT_AUTH') and object_name||object_type in (SELECT object_name||object_type from dba_objects where owner = 'SYS') and owner = 'SYSTEM'
select i.instance_name,p.value as asm_power_limit from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'asm_power_limit' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as max_dump_file_size from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'max_dump_file_size' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as remote_listener from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'remote_listener' order by i.inst_id
SELECT count(*) files_in_backup FROM V$DATAFILE d, V$TABLESPACE t, V$BACKUP b WHERE d.TS#=t.TS# AND b.FILE#=d.FILE# AND b.STATUS != 'NOT ACTIVE'
select count(*) media_recovery_files from v$recover_file
select count(*) indoubt_dist_trans from dba_2pc_pending
select count(*) orphan_dictionary_rows from sys.kottd$ where sys_nc_oid$ not in (select oid$ from sys.obj$ where type#=13)
select version time_zone_file_version from v$timezone_file

select count(*) sys_obj_tables from sys."_BASE_USER" u, sys.obj$ o, sys.col$ c, sys.coltype$ t where o.type# = 2 and o.owner# = u.user# and o.obj# = c.obj# and o.obj# = t.obj# and c.intcol# = t.intcol# and bitand(c.property, 1) = 0 and bitand(t.flags, 128) <> 0 and u.name = 'SYS'

SELECT count(*) connect_role_grantee_count FROM dba_role_privs WHERE granted_role = 'CONNECT' AND grantee NOT IN ('SYS', 'OUTLN', 'SYSTEM', 'CTXSYS', 'DBSNMP','LOGSTDBY_ADMINISTRATOR', 'ORDSYS','ORDPLUGINS', 'OEM_MONITOR', 'WKSYS', 'WKPROXY','WK_TEST', 'WKUSER', 'MDSYS', 'LBACSYS', 'DMSYS','WMSYS', 'OLAPDBA', 'OLAPSVR', 'OLAP_USER','OLAPSYS', 'EXFSYS', 'SYSMAN', 'MDDATA','SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA', 'XDB', 'ODM')
SELECT count(*) invalid_registry_comp_count FROM dba_registry where status != 'VALID'
SELECT tablespace_name audit_tablespace FROM dba_tables WHERE table_name='AUD$'
SELECT count(*) ext_ssl_authenticated_users FROM sys.user$ WHERE ext_username IS NOT NULL AND password = 'GLOBAL'
select count(*) mv_group_refresh_jobs from dba_jobs_running jr, v$session s, dba_jobs j where jr.sid=s.sid and j.job=jr.job and upper(j.what) like '%REFRESH%'

select count(*) mv_group_manual_refresh from ( select username, s.sid, rc.rowner, rc.rname, count(*) from v$lock l, dba_objects o, v$session s, dba_refresh_children rc where o.object_id=l.id1 and l.type='JI' and l.lmode=6 and s.sid=l.sid and o.object_type='TABLE' and o.object_name=rc.name and o.owner=rc.owner and rc.type='SNAPSHOT' group by username, s.sid, rc.rowner, rc.rname having count(*)=( select count(*) from dba_refresh_children where rowner= rc.rowner and rname=rc.rname and type='SNAPSHOT') )
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'diagnostic_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'core_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'diagnostic_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'background_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'diagnostic_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'background_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'diagnostic_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'background_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'background_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select i.host_name,i.instance_name,p.value from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'background_dump_dest' order by i.inst_id
select log_mode db_log_mode from v$database
select count(*) redo_log_file_less_than_4mb from v$log where bytes <4194304
select i.instance_name, round(sum(bytes)/1024/1024,0) sp from gv$sgastat s, gv$instance i where i.inst_id = s.inst_id and pool in ('shared pool') group by instance_name
select count(extent_management) no_of_dictionary_managed_ts from dba_tablespaces where extent_management !='LOCAL'
select count(ALLOCATION_TYPE) uniform_allocation_type_ts from dba_tablespaces where ALLOCATION_TYPE != 'UNIFORM'
select count(SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT) auto_segment_space_management from dba_tablespaces where SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT !='AUTO' and contents = 'PERMANENT' and tablespace_name !='SYSTEM'

select b1.inst_id, ((b1.value / decode(b2.value,0,1, b2.value)) * 10) avg_gc_cr_block_receive_time from gv$sysstat b1, gv$sysstat b2 where b1.name = 'global cache cr block receive time' and b2.name = 'global cache cr blocks received' and b1.inst_id = b2.inst_id

select i.instance_name, ((b1.value / decode(b2.value,0,1, b2.value)) * 10) avg_gc_current_block_recv_time from gv$sysstat b1, gv$sysstat b2, gv$instance i where b1.name = 'global cache current block receive time' and b2.name = 'global cache current blocks received' and b1.inst_id = b2.inst_id and i.inst_id = b1.inst_id

select i.instance_name, ((b1.value / decode(b2.value,0,1, b2.value)) *10) avg_gc_cr_block_receive_time from gv$sysstat b1, gv$sysstat b2, gv$instance i where b1.name = 'gc cr block receive time' and b2.name = 'gc cr blocks received' and b1.inst_id = b2.inst_id and i.inst_id = b1.inst_id

select i.instance_name, ((b1.value / decode(b2.value,0,1,b2.value)) * 10) avg_gc_current_block_recv_time from gv$sysstat b1, gv$sysstat b2,gv$instance i where b1.name = 'gc current block receive time' and b2.name = 'gc current blocks received' and b1.inst_id = b2.inst_id and i.inst_id = b1.inst_id
select i.instance_name,p.value as undo_management from gv$parameter p,gv$instance i where p.inst_id = i.inst_id and p.name = 'undo_management' order by i.inst_id
select i.instance_name, sum( decode( upper(c.is_public), 'NO', 1, 0 ) ) cluster_interconnects from gv$instance i left outer join gv$cluster_interconnects c using (inst_id) group by i.instance_name
select nvl(sum(read_errs + write_errs),0) asm_disk_read_write_error from v$asm_disk

select path as disks, group_number as asm_disk_group_number from v$asm_disk where group_number=0 and label is null union select listagg(path,',') within group(order by label) as disks, sum(group_number) as asm_disk_group_number from v$asm_disk where label is not null group by label
select count(*) asm_rebal_ops_in_wait from v$asm_operation where operation like 'REBAL' and state like 'WAIT'
select count(*) asm_rebal_ops_in_wait from v$asm_operation where pass like 'REBALANCE' and state like 'WAIT'

select count(*) as asm_incorrect_users_count, listagg(a.NAME,',') within group (order by a.NAME) files, LISTAGG(u.OS_NAME,',') within group (order by u.OS_NAME) as users from v$asm_alias a, v$asm_user u, v$asm_file f where a.FILE_NUMBER = f.FILE_NUMBER and f.USER_NUMBER = u.USER_NUMBER and u.OS_NAME like 'CRSUSER__ASM_%'
select i.instance_name, value as asm_diskstring from gv$parameter p, gv$instance i where i.inst_id = p.inst_id and name like 'asm_diskstring' order by i.inst_id

select count(*) as spare_param_count, listagg(ksppinm,',') within group(order by ksppinm) as spare_parameters from x$ksppi a, x$ksppcv b where a.indx=b.indx and ksppinm like '_%_spare_parameter%' and ksppstdf like 'FALSE'
select distinct b.name as diskgroup, a.value as compatible_asm from v$asm_attribute a , v$asm_diskgroup b where a.group_number = b.group_number and a.name like 'compatible.asm'
select distinct b.name as diskgroup, a.value as compatible_rdbms from v$asm_attribute a , v$asm_diskgroup b where a.group_number = b.group_number and a.name like 'compatible.rdbms'

select count(*) as cells_with_multiple_fg, listagg(cell,',') within group (order by cell) as cells from (select cell,count(cell) as fg_count from (select distinct regexp_substr(path,'[^/]+',2) as cell, failgroup from v$asm_disk) group by cell) where fg_count>1
select name as diskgroup, free_mb as free_space, '50MB' as expected_free_space from v$asm_diskgroup where state like 'MOUNTED'
select cache_size from dba_sequences where sequence_name = 'IDGEN1$' and sequence_owner = 'SYS'
select cache_size from dba_sequences where sequence_name = 'AUDSES$' and sequence_owner = 'SYS'

select i.instance_name, decode(p.value, NULL,0, p.value) active_instance_count from gv$instance i left outer join (select p.inst_id, p.value from gv$parameter p where p.name = 'active_instance_count') p using(inst_id)
select count (*) from v$datafile where name like '+%'
SELECT count(*) as sys_java_obj FROM dba_objects WHERE object_type LIKE '%JAVA%' AND owner='SYS'

SELECT CASE COUNT(DISTINCT(tzname)) WHEN 183 then 1 WHEN 355 then 1 WHEN 347 then 1 WHEN 377 then 2 WHEN 186 then CASE COUNT(tzname) WHEN 636 then 2 WHEN 626 then 3 ELSE 0 END WHEN 185 then 3 WHEN 386 then 3 WHEN 387 then case COUNT(tzname) WHEN 1438 then 3 ELSE 0 end WHEN 391 then case COUNT(tzname) WHEN 1457 then 4 ELSE 0 end WHEN 392 then case COUNT(tzname) WHEN 1458 then 4 ELSE 0 end WHEN 188 then case COUNT(tzname) WHEN 637 then 4 ELSE 0 end WHEN 189 then case COUNT(tzname) WHEN 638 then 4 ELSE 0 end ELSE 0 end as time_zone_file_version FROM v$timezone_names
SELECT count(*) as standby_databases FROM v$parameter WHERE name LIKE 'log_archive_dest%' AND UPPER(value) LIKE 'SERVICE%'
SELECT value as filesystemio_options FROM gv$parameter WHERE name='filesystemio_options'
